title: Conduct Due Diligence for Commercial Purchase
description: A client is under contract to buy a small apartment building. The agent must manage the due diligence process.

tasks.description: Create a due diligence checklist including items like reviewing all leases, service contracts, and financial statements.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent generates a comprehensive checklist for the transaction.

tasks.description: Request all necessary documents from the seller's agent.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent sends a formal request for all checklist items.

tasks.description: Track the received documents and follow up on outstanding items before the due diligence period expires.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent maintains an organized tracking system and ensures all documents are received on time.
